Description: Jalan Ampang,Persiaran Hampshire , 50450 Kuala Lumpur , Stsela||Stkua
Review1:
Stayed 13 Feb to 16 Feb 2020.
Hotel is old but they have tried their best to maintain it.
Location wise it's perfect, few minutes of walk from KLCC and twin tower.
We booked deluxe room and it was allocated at 7th floor with balcony. Construction was such that you easily can walk to other room's balcony, bit strange.
Room was spacious. But if want to have any sorts of entertainment in room, you will be disappointed. There is TV but total 19 channels to count, and only 15 was with any signal and ...more
Review2: Location was appropriate even the staff services were great with fantastic room with nice amenities in it.

Description: 13-15 Leboh Ampang, 50050 Kuala Lumpur, Stkua||Stsela, Malaysia
Review1:
The hotel is located at the centre of the city. very near to Central market, Kasturi walk, China town etc. KL Tower, Twin Tower also below 3 KM. For vegetarians especially south indians, Saravana Bhavan is very near.
The receiptionist is very nice, the ambience of the hotel is awesome. The facilities are too good. Fridge, Iron box/table, coffee maker etc are there in room. Also the hotel rooms are so secure. No one can come to your floor without access card.
Review2:
1. Prime location
2. GRAB car pick up point & drop off
3. Walkable distance from famous Indian restaurants like Saravana Bhavan
4. Awesome breakfast
5. Masjid Jamek metro station is just 2minutes away (walking distance)
6. Merdeka Square, China town, Petaling street are nearby

Review1:
Except staff service everything was Poor!! worst Room,Dirty floor and wall,Dirty Toilet,No Charging point,Remote was not working later they change but old big TV,entrance in front of cement debris,overall bad experiance,Food was bad,better you guys eat indian food exactly oposite of Hotel "Sharma Restaurant, they have good indian taste and masala Tea as well,if you missed taste in Bhutan.

Description: P.O. Box 1265, Shaba, Paro , Pincode- 12001
Review1: Location is good,, 5 km before the market place,, by the side of beautiful Paro river. Great breakfast menu. Delicious Indian food served. Everything is good,, but overall the room rate is very high.
Review2: The location and ambiance was quite good, There were no smoking room over there, rather then that everything was good.

Description: Tiger Nest Resort,Satsam Chorten, Paro, Post Box No.1275.
Review1: Amazing stay and amazing service by the hotel staff.
Review2: Hotel is located close to Tiger's nest. View from room is awesome. This hotel is located little far from Paro town so you don't get any noise but at the same time you would need taxi to go to town. All the staff are super responsive and very helpful. They always greet you with smile. I found rooms were not up to the mark. Everything was in working condition in room but they need to do a comprehensive maintenance of all plumbing and other amenities to make it worthy of price.

Description: Nishiphu Paro ., Pincode- 12001
Review1:
Spacious rooms. 2 room heaters, an electric kettle and wifi is available 24x7. A nice balcony with view of tiger's nest. In house restaurant is available which serves any kind of food veg & non-veg both. order for dinner has to be given by 7:30 in the evening. Quality of food is very good. Staffs are polite and they respond very quickly. Spa, stone bath etc. are available although it is costly compared to local price.
Very Safe, Room heater, Hot water, Wifi, Electric Kettle, Behaviour of the staffs, prompt response of the staffs, in-house restaurant with good quality food, room service.
Review2: It was an awesome experience.The location is just beside the mountains.You will get a view of tiger nest from there. There is a sweet sound of the Paro river from the resort only during night. The rooms are very clean and staffs are well cooperated. Foods are awesome. I will definitely recommend others to stay there.

Description: Satsam Chorten, Paro , Pincode- 12001
Review1: Staff behavior, amenities and services were excellent. Location was perfect. There was dining facility There was no complimentary services.
Review2: Staff behavior, amenities and services were nice. Location was far from city. There was dining facility. Free breakfast was complimentary services.

Description: Hotel Khamsun , Tshongdue Opposite To Municipal Office, Po 12001 Paro
Review1: Central Location. Near to Taxi stand. Nice food. Heater was working and the room was clean. Loved the stay in Paro for our visit to Tiger nest
Review2:
First thing delighted me is the excellent customer service. They try their best to keep you happy with respect to the room and food. Deluxe room sizes are good (superior rooms should be bit compact for the couples, but still rooms are good). Food is kinda of ok, not great compared to few local shops.
Hot water, Room Heater and Bed heater hs available - Much needed for winter travellers.
Finally awesome location, walkable to local market , restaurants and shops near by.
Overall a good stay, but food taste needs to be improved.

Description: Samarlungkha, Geptey, Paro , Pincode- 123456

Review2:
Homely stay, room & restaurant are good, foods are tasty, Manager & the staffs are well behaved & smart.
Homely stay.

Description: Near Letchmi Tea Estate, Mankulam, Munnar, Pin - 685612
Review1:
Excellent place to stay at munnar...
You can spend whole day with elixir...
There s plenty to do inside the resort premises...
Inside a rainforest...
Good food, trained and well behaved people all around to help you...
Clean rooms with all amenities...
Pool view, forest view restaurant...
Overall we enjoyed the stay...
Review2:
Elixir is a perfect getaway place in case you're looking for a relaxing and soothing stay in the midst of nature. It's in a tropical forest setup with tress right up to your balcony. The misty hills of Munnar won't be visible to you amid the wilderness and you might want to consider that before booking. Service and restaurant is great as expected. Jacuzzi is nice and the rooms are pretty cosy. Lot of space to roam around in the property so you might as well spend a few days here.
The rooms are very cosy and the jacuzzi added a lot of fun to our stay.

The food in the hotel was too good - quite a lot of varieties were offered during breakfast, lunch and dinner. The swimming pool was big and clean as well. Restaurant is good- good value for money & courteous staff. Breakfast buffet especially South Indian food was fine. Overall stay was fine.
